# Introduction {#introduction .page-header}

<p class='lead'> There are quite a few philosophical differences towards data manipulation between <span class='text-info'>  dplyr </span> and <span class='text-info'>  data.table </span>. Most of these differences are *by design* and are in alignment with the priorities with which these packages are developed. </p>
